Articles.Content:
Hello to all, a small presentation to all the kerbonauts

I am French and I love KSP! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well hello, Well! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*Please kill me now...*

> 
> Well hello, Well! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> *Please kill me now...*

**\*Stab\***

Greetings, Well! I will assume you know where the cookies are since you were near the area of import.
